title: (x) Friends of LaGuardia Place - ITC Zapf Chancery, Caslon Swash, Baskerville {Lex}
content:
Hi everyone,

Can anyone id the 3 fonts in this sample.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [laltr.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019065808/http:/typophile.com/files/laltr.jpg) | 68.8 KB |
author: wandar

comments.content:
The serif looks like a Baskerville, possibly Mrs. Eaves.

- Lex

The lowercase on the top line is [Zapf Chancery Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019065808/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=EF.426.0.2&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=riends+of+a+uardia+lace&sampleSize=48), [squooshed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019065808/http:/typophile.com/wiki/squooshed). The caps are from another font.

The small bold text is [Zapf Chancery Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019065808/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=EF.425.0.4&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=532+LaGuardia&sampleSize=48).

- Lex

The swash caps look like Caslon Swash Italic, but it's not the Adobe version, which has a different 'F'.

- Lex
